title: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
instructions: Drain and rinse 1 can of chickpeas and place in a large bowl
Dice 1 cucumber, 1/2 red onion, 1 cup cherry tomatoes, and 1 bell pepper
Add all vegetables to the bowl with chickpeas
Crumble 1/2 cup feta cheese over the salad
Whisk together 3 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp lemon juice, salt, and pepper
Pour dressing over salad and toss gently
Refrigerate for 30 minutes before serving for best flavor

title: Protein-Packed Quinoa Bowl
instructions: Cook 1 cup quinoa according to package instructions
Season 8 oz chicken breast with salt, pepper, and garlic powder
Grill or bake chicken until internal temperature reaches 165°F
Dice and roast 1 sweet potato with olive oil at 400°F for 20 minutes
Steam 1 cup broccoli florets until tender-crisp
Slice 1 avocado
Assemble bowl with quinoa, sliced chicken, roasted sweet potato, broccoli, and avocado
Drizzle with olive oil and lime juice before serving

title: Low-Carb Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
instructions: Spiralize 2 large zucchini into noodles
In a food processor, combine 2 cups fresh basil, 2 cloves garlic, 1/4 cup pine nuts, and 1/4 cup grated parmesan
Pulse while slowly adding 1/3 cup olive oil until pesto forms
Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a large pan over medium heat
Sauté zucchini noodles for 2-3 minutes until just tender
Toss zucchini with pesto and halved cherry tomatoes
Top with additional grated parmesan before serving
